title: Protecting Your Software Supply Chain: Assessing the Risks Before Deployment
description: Imagine you're considering a new car for your family. Before making a purchase, you evaluate its safety ratings, fuel efficiency, and reliability. You might even take it for a test drive to ensure it meets your needs.
